items.sentence: Tom says he doesn\'t know when the meeting starts.
You shouldn\'t take the things Tom says seriously.
You\'ll be able to see the difference very easily.
Are you seriously thinking about getting involved?
I don\'t want to discuss Tom\'s problems with you.
You shouldn\'t drink so much coffee late at night.
Would you like to go out and get something to eat?
I pretended that I didn\'t know what was going on.
You don\'t have to eat that if you don\'t want to.
Is there anything good to eat in the refrigerator?
